comment: I had mine on tuesday and I felt very unwell on wednesday and had to stay in bed but I do have m.e and fibromyalgia too. Still delighted to have it though!
amr:
# ::snt I had mine on tuesday and I felt very unwell on wednesday and had to stay in bed but I do have m.e and fibromyalgia too. Still delighted to have it though!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (h / have-03
                        :ARG0 (ii / i)
                        :ARG1 (t / thing
                              :poss ii)
                        :time (d / date-entity
                              :weekday (t2 / tuesday)))
                  :op2 (f / feel-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (w / well-05
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG1 ii
                              :degree (v / very))
                        :time (d2 / date-entity
                              :weekday (w2 / wednesday))))
            :ARG2 (o / obligate-01
                  :ARG1 ii
                  :ARG2 (s / stay-01
                        :ARG1 ii
                        :ARG3 (b / bed))))
      :snt2 (h2 / have-03
            :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
            :ARG1 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (t3 / thing
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "M.E"))
                  :op2 (t4 / thing
                        :name n
                        :op1 " fibromyalgia")))
      :mod (t5 / too)
      :snt3 (d3 / delight-01
            :ARG0 (ii3 / it)
            :ARG1 ii2
            :mod (s2 / still)
            :ARG1-of (h3 / have-concession-91)))
